1.content:
You wake up one morning and as you groggily get out of bed you notice a strange looking miniature house sitting square in the middle of your room. "What the hell is that?" you say to yourself. "Oh, that's just a present from me to you" says a voice from seemingly nowhere. "Who's there!" you yell as you spin around trying to find the source of the voice. "Oh you will never find me, i'm in your head."

As you continue to look for the voice and eventually give up your attention is directed back towards the house."Are you still there?" you ask the voice. "Yes, do you need something?" the voice replied. "You said this house was a present but I don't get it." "Why don't you go open one of the panels on the top of the house, then everything should start to make sense" the voice said. You make your way to the house and crouch down to open the panel,it seems to be the average room you would see in a dollhouse except for one thing, there sleeping peacefully on the bed is your best friend Jessica.

"This doesn't make any sense, how is she so small" you go to reach for her to see if she is real but the voice commands you to stop and without any hesitation you do almost as if by force. "Ill let you have your fun in a moment but first I need to tell you some rules. #1 These are actually the girls you know so and they have not been altered in anyway. #2 The girls are invincible but they can still feel the pain they normally would . #3 If you need something just ask. Now they wont wake up naturally so unless you or someone else wakes them up they will stay asleep, so when your ready go ahead and wake them up."

With that the voice disappeared, "he kept talking like there were more than one girl" you think to your self, as you do that you notice four more panels. As you open them up you discover the sleeping bodies of four more girls, girls from your school. You recognize them all immediately, Emma, Sabrina, Molly, and Anna. You decide that it would be best to wake up Jessica first seeing as she knows you and trusts you. You wake her up by gently poking her on the back, she comes to and as she see's your massive figure she screams. It takes several minutes to calm her down and catch her up on whats happening, the two of you decide that Jessica will go around and wake everyone else up and at least try to inform them of their situation. After 10 minutes they are all standing outside the house on your carpet staring in awe as you kneel down in front of them.

What is your next choice
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
Clearing your throat in an attempt to break the silence, you start speaking, "Well... I don't know how you guys got shrunk, other than that a voice in my head seems to have had something to do with it, but I'll do my best to take care of you guys and get you back to normal if I can." This seems to put the girls at ease even if only just a little. "well I don't know about you but i'm starving so i'm going to go get breakfast."

As you get up to leave you say "does anyone wanna come with me?" It takes a couple seconds but Jessica ends up raising her hand. You smile and reach out your hand to grab her. As you wrap your hand around her tiny frame she lets out a terrified scream and begins to struggle. You squeeze your hand firmly just to get her to stop struggling. She is on the verge of tears when you tell her "Jessica its me i'm not going to hurt you...it's okay." After she finally settles down you adjust your hand so that she can sit in the palm and begin to leave. But out of the corner of your eye you see Anna squirming around almost like she wants to come with, but she doesn't say anything so you leave to go find food.

As you head towards your kitchen Jessica asks about your parents and about her own. "I actually don't know, I wonder how its going to go when they get home." Just as you say that the voice chimes in "I have moved you, the girls and your house to a realm outside of space and time, so you don't have to worry about anyone else." As the voice says this you look out one of your windows and see an infinite white nothing, "I guess he wasn't kidding."

You and Jessica go to the fridge and decide to have pancakes, after about 10 minutes of preparing and eating the two of you decide to head back to your room. when you get back to your room you open the door to see Emma screaming at crying Anna.

You give a warning look to Emma, who cowers. Molly steps up and says, "I'll make sure everything stay all right back here." You nod and smile at Molly, then carry Jessica and Anna to
1212.title: Jessica and Anna

12121.content: You carry Jessica and Anna to your bedroom and set them on your
12121.title: your bedroom

choices: take Molly and Sabrina straight to the family room
stop when Anna asks if she can come along
1213.content:
"Hey, uh, listen, maybe Molly and Sabrina and I could go down to the computer in the family room and do a computer search, and maybe get an idea of what happened," you say.

Okay, you tell yourself, you know what happened, sort of, generally. But not specifically. And you figure that if you look like you don't know what's going on, you might get along with the girls better if you act like you're trying to fix things. Sure, they're really not in a position to object, if you insist on things, but it would probably be better if everyone was voluntarily cooperative about things.

Picking Sabrina to help you do research made sense. She was the smartest person in your school. And taking Molly made sense because Sabrina probably wouldn't feel comfortable with just being with you. And Jessica would make sure Emma didn't unload on Anna again when you were gone.

Molly and Sabrina whisper together and nod, probably coming to the same conclusion. They don't look completely comfortable with things when they step into your cupped hands, but they're not freaking out either.

You...
1213.title: Molly and Sabrina

1214.content:
"You two," you say pointing at Molly and Emma. They immediately come to a halt, wide eyed. Emma especially is keeping her "inner bitch" on a leash. You guess that having a giant face shouting at you, letting you know he's tired of your shit, is enough to force you to behave yourself.

"We need to go have a private conversation." You put your hands down near the dollhouse, palms up. You're hoping that since you're asking for both Emma and Molly to come talk, that no one will feel too nervous. That's why you're not grabbing either.

Emma looks like she wants to refuse anyway, but Molly leans over and whispers something to her. Emma nods and they both ginergerly climb on to your palm. You carefully cup your hands and carry the two tiny young women to
1214.title: Molly and Emma

12144.content:
"Okay, this may seem a little weird," you begin as you carry the two cheerleaders over to your bed and out of sight of the other dollhouse inhabitants. At the mention of the word 'weird,' Molly chortles, and even Emma manages to break a smile.

"Okay, this whole thing is weird," you allow. "But I want to explore the physics of it," you explain as you set Molly and Emma down on your bed and then kneel on the floor. "So, since you two are athletes..." Emma actually preens, and Molly nods approvingly. Both girls have been treated as non-athletes all their lives, even though cheerleading is a very physically demanding sport.

"I thought we could put you two on a springy surface and see if you can do the same routines you do at games and rallies. See if you can jump as high and stuff, proportional wise to your new height, or maybe even higher."

"That's not a bad idea," Emma says, the fear now gone from her voice. You're happy that her voice hasn't gone back into bitch mode.

"So what should we start off with first?" Molly asks her friend. Emma pauses, considering, then suggests, "How about some
12144.title: your bedroom

122.content:
So naturally you pick up Jessica. First of all, you two have been friends for the longest time. Second, well, you two have been friends for the longest time. You'd like to be more than friends, but Jessica has kept you safely in the friend zone for as long as you've known each other. Not only has she kept you in the friend zone, she's done it in such a way that you're too worried about making things uncomfortable to try to get out of the friend zone.

The size difference. though, means the rules are about to change.

When she reach for her, Jessica cringes away, but you tell her, "Don't worry, Jessica, I just want to go somewhere where you and I can talk private. She nods, and allows you to pick her up You carry her to
122.title: Jessica

choices: What do you mean, we'll take care of each other?
So where do we start looking for answers first?
1221.content:
"Listen," you tell Jessica as you put her down on the pillow of your bed, "I'm not really sure what's going on here---"

An out and out lie, you tell yourself, you know exactly what's going on. The voice in your head pretty much said the girls had been shrunken down for you to enjoy, but there's not reason to tell Jessica that.

"---But you and I are friends, so we'll work this out together, right?"

Jessica nodded, trying (and failing) to stand up on the pillow. Finally, she gives up and sits cross-legged.

"So we're going to try to get us all restored to normal height, and take care of us in the meantime?" Jessica asks. You nod, not sure if it's possible to restore the five girls to their normal height, or even if you want to. But you will take care of them. You can promise that.

"Don't worry, Jessica," you answer. "We'll all take care of each other."

Jessica nods, then asks
1221.title: your bedroom

12211.content:
"What do you mean, we'll take care of each other?" Jessica asks.

"Well," you tell here, "We'll give each other emotional support. You know?"

You reach out and stroke Jessica's hair with a fingertip as you say this. Jessica
12211.title: What do you mean, we'll take care of each o...

122111.content:
She leaned in as you stroke her hair. You are happy that it seems like she likes you too. "You use your finger to push your head up to meet your eyes.
 
         "You know Jessica, I have always like you. You are pretty hot." You said softly
 
Jessica blushed
 
         "This is rare opportunity for us to get to know each other more personally."
 
         "How are we going to get to know?" Jessica asked
 
         "I think you know."
 
         How should you guys get to "know each other"?
122111.title: leans in to your touch

123.content:
So you've always had a thing for Asian girls. Okay, most of the Asian girls...ALL o the Asian girls...you've had a thing for were models you've seen on the internet. But now you have one in front of you who, at just six inches, really can't do anything to stop you from doing anything you want to do.

Not that you're going to do anything to hurt anyone. But you notice Sabrina looks different than she does in school. At school, she hunches over a lot, and has those glasses on, and her hair is always up and in some weird hairstyle that nerdy girls like.

In front of you, you see Sabrina must have been sleeping when she was transported from wherever she was to the dollhouse in your house. She's wearing this flowery nightgown that stretches almost all the way down to her feet. It's not revealing, not really, but when she moves around, she can see Sabrina has a very, very nice form, and a pair of very large, very firm breasts. Her hair is black and straight and reaches down to her ass. And her glassless face makes her look really hot, and a little confused, which makes her cute as well.

Before you even know what you're doing, your hand is grabbing Sabrina.

"Pleasedonthurtmepleasedonthurtmepleasedonthurtme," she keeps repeating, almost hysterical.

"I'm not going to hurt you," you promise Sabrina. "I just need to talk to you about what happens. After all, you're the smartest person here."

You don't know if she believes you or not, but at least she's calmed down.

Without a further word, you take Sabrina to
123.title: Sabrina

choices: make a detour to your bedroom
1234.content:
It's kind of weird knowing that underneath that nightgown Sabrina is naked. Well, maybe she's wearing panties, but that's about it. You wish you had picked her up differently, so that your fingertips were on some strategic places. But she still feels pretty good to you.

"So where are you taking me?" Sabrina asked,.She sounds a lot calmer than she did a few moments before.

"To my parents' home office," you reply. "That's where the computer is. We can get on the internet and try to look stuff up or something." Personally, you're fairly sure you won't be able to find any information about the voice in your head on the internet. But you figure just going through the motions will make Sabrina calm, if not happy.

"So, what's it like being six inches tall?" you ask, thinking it's a stupid question, but feeling you got to say something. "I mean, apart from the obvious."

"Well, it really doesn't feel that different from being normal height," Sabrina answers. "Well, except..."

Sabrina turns a bright red and now you just have to know.

"Except..." you repeat/ask.

"Well, when you picked me up, it felt kind of nice," Sabrina answered. "Like, part fuzzy warm, because I know you're not going to hurt me, and are going to take care of me. And well, part tingly." Sabrina turns really red now at the last admission.

You wonder what exactly 'tingly' means as you
1234.title: the home office

12342.content: As you carry Sabrina into your bedroom, you decide to put her down on
12342.title: make a detour to your bedroom

124.content:
In the looks department, Molly is just as hot as Emma. The only difference is, Molly seems to be content to remain in Emma's shadow and, unlike Emma, Molly prefers to be the conciliator, not the instigator.

"Where---where are you taking me?" Molly stutters.

"Just somewhere where we can talk," you say, "And figure out what to do about this situation."

With that, you take Molly to
124.title: Molly

info.brief_description: You wake up to find a dollhouse full of living dolls, but the girls are people you know
info.description:
Plot:
You wake up one morning to find a mysterious dollhouse sitting in your bedroom, a strange voice telling you to have fun

Rules:
-The girls are all 18+ so go wild
-You are unable to shrink
-No one sentence chapters
-No gore

Characters:
You-Male, Danny, 18, an average looking high school senior who is not popular but not unpopular
Emma-The stereotypical popular cheerleader bitch, hates you, blonde, Caucasian
Jessica-One of your closest friends, black hair, Hispanic
Sabrina-Very quiet, likes to keep to herself, shy, wears glasses, black hair, Asian
Molly-Very popular, hangs out with Emma, not a mean bone in her body, brown hair, Caucasian
Anna-bullied by Emma, energetic, always cheerful, comes from an abusive household
